meta.description: Optimize the inventory of phones and laptops to maximize profit while considering space and budget constraints.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products available in the store.

params.name: space
params.description: Floor space required for each product.

vars.name: inventory
vars.description: Number of each product to keep in inventory.

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.expr: sum(profit[p] * inventory[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from selling phones and laptops.

constraints.name: floor_space_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(space[p] * inventory[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total floor space used by inventory must not exceed available space.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(cost[p] * inventory[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total cost of inventory must not exceed the budget.

constraints.name: laptop_ratio_constraint
constraints.description: At least 80% of all appliances in stock must be laptops.
